title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When restarting with build 20021001, verify that a welcome page is displayed. Ensure that the line 'welcome...' in the 'prefstore.ini' file of the workbench metadata is removed. Click on any link in the welcome page. The appropriate action is executed but the clicked link is not selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
EB: When restarting with build 20021001, the welcome page should be displayed. If necessary, remove the line 'welcome...' in the 'prefstore.ini' file of the workbench metadata. Click on any link in the welcome page. After the appropriate action is executed, the clicked link should be selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
SR: The links in the welcome page should be selected when clicked to provide more context to the user when they return to the welcome page. The ProductInfoDialog dialog already has this functionality.
